entry.name: Database/Server
entry.description: Database server.

entry.name: Database/Database
entry.description: Database name.

entry.name: Database/UseNT
entry.description: Use NT security to connect to the database.

entry.name: Database/Username
entry.description: Username given during database conenct. Ignored if using NT security.

entry.name: Database/Password
entry.description: Password used during database connect. Ignored if using NT security.

entry.name: Query/LimitIndex
entry.description: Number of fields non-paying users are allowed in their query index.

entry.name: Query/LimitFilter
entry.description: Number of fields non-paying users are allowed in their query filter. Does not include catagory.

entry.name: Net/ClientPort
entry.description: Port number at which the client is known to listen.

entry.name: Net/ServerPort
entry.description: Port the server should listen on.

entry.name: Net/ServerIp
entry.description: NOTE: doesent actually bind to this IP! Just reports it to the client!.

entry.name: Net/PingTimeout
entry.description: Timespan to wait for connection and then for data during a client ping.

entry.name: Net/KeepAliveInterval
entry.description: Interval between keep-alive requests sent to the client.

entry.name: Net/DormantConnectionTimeout
entry.description: Timeout after which dormant (non-logged in still connected) connections are dropped.

entry.name: Net/LinkDeadConnectionTimeout
entry.description: Timeout after which link-dead (connections that stop responding to keep-alives) are dropped.

entry.name: Misc/DefaultVersion
entry.description: Version string that the server assigns to connection that do not provide a version number.

entry.name: Misc/CurrentVersion
entry.description: Version string that the server assumes is the current client version. Server will only query the database if the client's version differs from this value.

entry.name: Query/StorageTimeout
entry.description: Timeout after which the server will refresh its cached data concerning which users are sharing a particular file.

entry.name: Query/ContestFieldCutoff
entry.description: Maximum number of indexed fields for a picture (agregate of all fields in all indexes) before the server will not return that picture during a contest query. Ex: cuttoff is 5, any picture with 5 or less fields will be used in the contest.

entry.name: Query/SearchCutoff
entry.description: Maximum number of pictures the server will examine during a query. Once this limit is reached, the server will stop processing the query and return whatever results it has accumulated so far.

entry.name: Query/ResultsCutoff
entry.description: Maximum number of results the server will find for a query. Once this limit is reached, the server stops processing the query and returns the results.

entry.name: Query/QueryProcessorCount
entry.description: Number of query processors to run. Use one less than the number of CPUs in the system.

entry.name: Net/ConnectionCheckInterval
entry.description: Interval between Connection Checks. A Connection Check examines each active connection, and decides whether or not to close it based on how long the connection has been dormant or link-dead.

entry.name: Query/MediaRebuildInterval
entry.description: Interval at which the server rebuilds its list of pictures. This is a very lengthy procedure and should not be done more than once per hour.
